content:
Hello folks,

I have a use case where a practitioner can launch our app from within EPIC. Our app is a web base application secured using Auth0. We would like to authorize the practitioner into our system using the SMART on FHIR launch token, without requiring the user to login again to Auth0.

  1. Is this usecase supported by SMART on FHIR?
  2. If it is, has anyone got an example of this setup?

Many thanks
